I donâ€™t give a toss about some techbro getting fucked over by another techbroâ€™s company, but this is fucking hilarious.Especially considering Elon believes his leadership is worth $1T.â€œPlenty of other electric automakers have introduced electric hypercars in the eight years since Musk declared the second Roadster a thing, with no sign of it being any closer to reality, if the latest job postings are accurate. And it seems that over time, a lot of the people who gave the company a hefty depositâ€”some say interest-free loanâ€”have become tired of waiting and want their money back.And thatâ€™s not quite so easy, it turns out. Muskâ€™s current Silicon Valley rival is the latest to discover this. According to Sam Altmanâ€™s social media account, he placed an order for a Roadster on July 11, 2018, with a deposit of $45,000 ($58,206 in todayâ€™s money). But after emailing Tesla for a refund, he discovered the email address associated with preorders had been deleted.â€#TeslaRoadster #TSLA https://arstechnica.com/cars/2025/10/sam-altman-wants-a-refund-for-his-50000-tesla-roadster-deposit/

Exactly!
In Dec 2024 Musk owned 410.79 million tesla shares, let's round that down to 400M.
By buying shares for USD 1B his existing shares gained a value of USD 30 per share.
That is 30 x 400M = over USD 12B. 
He may use that 12B as a collateral for a bank loan to cover the purchase of these new shares. 
So the shares are practically free for him.Money makes money.#tesla #TSLA  #musk #limitarianism #limitarisme #EatTheRich
